attributes.action: reinstate the ancient right that No Freeman shall be taken, or imprisoned, or be disseised of his Freehold, or Liberties, or free Customs, or be outlawed, or exiled, or any otherwise destroyed FOR MORE THAN THREE DAYS; nor will we pass upon him, nor condemn him, but by lawful Judgment of his Peers, or by the Law of the Land. We will sell to no man, we will not deny or defer to any man either Justice or Right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want liberty under law, not tyranny. We recognise that if there is insufficient evidence to charge someone after three days then either s/he is not guilty of an offence or the security services are underfunded.
